Naydra Farming 1: (==) Move a bit northeast to the location indicated. Set time to morning while looking at the mountain top. Go quickly to N19.
(==) While doing N19, Naydra should be audible coming up the side of mountain. Move to the location indicated, then stand at the edge and wait. Hopefully the horn lands in the area aroud N19.

_Material<Shard of Naydra's Horn>.comment: ネルドラの角のかけら

Naydra Farming 1: (==) Move down the side of the mountain and set a fire to morning. Naydra should be coming from the west over Lanayru Bay. Continue gliding NW toward N12, and look west down Lanayru Bay. Naydra should spawn. Shoot the claw when she gets near the N12 area. If the claw flies off in a bad location, get N12 first then chase the claw.

_Korok::N29.notes: From the west side of the pond, make a cryo block on the edge of the lilly pad. Glide over.

_Korok::N37.notes: Run around in a circle until stam is at 1 ring left, then drown fall into the lilly pad below.

_Korok::Z42.notes: Shoot the ballon down above the river.

.gale() and glide across.notes: Standing on the tree after getting the korok, gale and then glide across to Zora Stone Monument 5.

.gale() across.notes: From the edge next to the monument, to the wall on the other side. Climb up and go to monument 8.

Dinraal farm 1: From K11, go northeast to the peak that overlooks the Thyphlo Ruins.
To help aid in getting out, set a map pin on the enemy camp on the other side of the forest.

.gale() from the peak and glide into dar.notes: Look for glow of fires and then the orb.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Do this right after killing the lynel.

_Material<Dinraal Horn>.comment: オルドラの角のかけら

_Npc::Goron<Bayge/バケット>.comment: The Gut Check Challenge/ゴロンのド根性ガケ

Akkala Tech Lab: At A05, if it's raining or going to rain, adjust TOD to night.

_Snap::Quest<Blupee/ルミー>.notes: Backup if you missed it at Kaya Wan; Must be quick before stal enemies spawn or octoroks scare them away.

Akkala Tech Lab: Kill all the octorocks, and then sit to night. Collect the remaining beetles needed.

.gale() up to Zuna Kai.notes: It's possible to be too fast for them to have recharged. If that's the case, use the gale at the next convenient time.

_Tod::Night.notes: Look in the sky toward the West (in the direction of the labyrinth). Allow the chest to fall and land before continuing to Kilton.

_Snap::Quest<Kilton/キルトン>.notes: Take several pictures when he is in different positions to make sure one will work for the quest.

_Chest::Special<Salvager Vest>.comment: サルベージャーボディ

Transport blue flame and do A14.notes: Weapon smuggle the flame while doing the korok. Make sure to complete the race while still climbing on the wall or the torch will unsmuggle.

_Korok::A15.notes: Torch will unsmuggle. Just walk to ancient furnace.

Akkala Tech Lab: (==) Talking to Robbie will reduce Ancient Arrow count to 999. You can use the Ancient Furnace (Cherry) without talking to him. Buy ancient short sword, shield, bow. If short on guradian parts, kill the guardians in the basement of the labyrinth and on the way to Katosa Aug.

Follow the metal balls.notes: At the 5th metal ball, turn right and head for the rusty shield.

Put shield in tree.notes: From the pedestal, magnesis the shield into the tree. If you have space in inventory, pick up the shield.

_Npc<Tasho/タッチオ>.comment: The Lost Pilgrimage/はじめての しれん
_Npc<Tasho/タッチオ>.notes: Start the quest and set Oaki on his way. It takes him 5m 20s to get to the shrine. Do the things below while waiting.

_Npc<Walton/ナモミン>.comment: Riddles of Hyrule/ハイラルのなぞなぞしれん

_Npc<Hestu>.notes: Get last bow slot, as many weapon slots as possible, then as many shield slots

Save and Reload.notes: This is required to get the Trial of the Sword side quest to become available.

_Npc<Beginning Trials>.notes: .link([Video]https://youtu.be/sBBQOTWx-Lc) - Eat a hearty food and endura food. Save. Eat attack up food and begin the trial.

Korok Forest: (==) The following is a list of chests in the Beginning Trials. Pick up what you think you will need. It is suggested to set your Sheika Sensor to treasure chest. It is also advised to break all wooden and metal crates as well as barrels.
B7 Eightfold Blade, Serpentine Spear, Shield of the Mind's Eye

_Npc<Middle Trials>.notes: .link([Video]https://youtu.be/1zcMJA35kN4) - Eat a hearty food and endura food. Save. Eat attack up food and begin the trial.

Korok Forest: (==) The following is a list of chests in the Middle Trials. Pick up what you think you will need. It is suggested to set your Sheika Sensor to treasure chest. It is also advised to break all wooden and metal crates as well as barrels.
M5 Falcon Bow, Hylian Trousers, Knight's Broadsword
M11 Forest Dweller's Spear, Forest Dweller's Sword, Hylian Tunic

_Npc<Final Trials>.notes: .link([Video]https://youtu.be/d4Lmyjr-5R4) - Eat a hearty food and endura food. Save. Eat attack up food and begin the trial.

Korok Forest: (==) The following is a list of chests in the Final Trials. Pick up what you think you will need. It is suggested to set your Sheika Sensor to treasure chest. It is also advised to break all wooden and metal crates as well as barrels.
F3 Knight's Bow, Knight's Shield, Royal Guard's Sword
F6 Ancient Arrow x3, Flamebreaker Boots, Knight's Bow
F12 Hylian Tunic, Royal Guard's Shield, Stone Smasher
F18 Royal Bow, Royal Broadsword, Royal Shield
